description: Deako believes that everyone should be able to enjoy the wonderful experiences of smart lighting, regardless of their budget.  We invented the modular light switch, giving homeowners maximum flexibility to customize and upgrade their systems, at any time, in minutes and without turning off the power. Deakoâs beautiful designer switches are like nothing else on the market today.  Deako Smart Lighting has been named the #1 Smart Lighting Control System by TecHome Builder, Top 25 Innovative IOT Companies by Entrepreneur, featured in âI Want That!â episode on DIY Network, Top 50 most promising Startups by Bloomberg, and âChanging The Way Builders Spec Light Switchesâ - Builder Magazine.

##### As Simple as it gets

Deako light switches can be easily installed by anyone. Control the ambiance of your home without the pain of hiring help.

## What people are saying about Deako...
Deako's products can not be beat. The quality and simplicity of installation are amazing. The [Smart Dimmer] surpassed my expectations. It is perfect for the sitting room where it was installed. 
Paul W.Customer
Being able to control the lights with our Google Home makes life so much easier, especially with our kids running around the house and my hands are full. And at the end of the night I can tell it to turn off all the lights in the house without having to run upstairs and turn off all the lights the kids "forgot" to turn off! 
JessicaCustomer
They are amazing, turned anyone into a electrician. 
David B.Verified customer
Super easy install, super easy setup, what's not to love? We have these on front porch and rear porch and will continue to add to other areas of our home for security. Especially love that it is smart home compatible (Echo). Thanks for your products Deako! 
AnonymousVerified customer

## Simple Timer
Save energy and your peace of mind with a switch that turns off on its own.
**Best for:**
  * Bathroom – Stop babysitting the bathroom fan or lights. Just choose a 10-, 30-, or 60-min timer and they’ll turn off automatically 
  * Hallways – move safely around the house at night or for a late snack without turning on the lights 
  * Attic, Garage, Closets – Install it anywhere you or others in the family tend to forget to turn off the lights


[ Speak With an Expert ](https://www.deako.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/bvm1/drh-preclose-packages>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20197%20284'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
[ ](https://www.deako.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aclose%26settings%3DeyJkb19ub3Rfc2hvd19hZ2FpbiI6IiJ9>)
## Simple Nightlight
Add a subtle glow to a dark room for added safety and security with this easy-to-find switch.
**Best for:**
  * Children’s bedroom – ease kids’ worries with a warm LED light that would spook any bogeyman
  * Hallways – move safely around the house at night or for a late snack without turning on the lights 
  * Bathrooms – subtle lighting is easy on groggy eyes during late night bathroom trips


[ Speak With an Expert ](https://www.deako.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/bvm1/drh-preclose-packages>)
[ FAQs ](https://www.deako.com/<#PackageFAQs>)
[ LEARN MORE ](https://www.deako.com/<#learnmore2>)
[ FAQs ](https://www.deako.com/<#PackageFAQs>)
[ LEARN MORE ](https://www.deako.com/<#learnmore2>)
[ Pricing ](https://www.deako.com/<#pricing-mobile>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20450%20652'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
[ ](https://www.deako.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aclose%26settings%3DeyJkb19ub3Rfc2hvd19hZ2FpbiI6IiJ9>)
## Simple Dimmer
Adjust the brightness of your lights and create your desired ambiance with a simple, tactile slide dimmer.
**Best for:**
  * Dining Room – set the ambiance for a nice meal
  * Bedrooms – wind down with dim lighting before sleep
  * Multi-use spaces – set the tone depending on activity


[ Speak With an Expert ](https://www.deako.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/bvm1/drh-preclose-packages>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20444%20644'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
[ ](https://www.deako.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aclose%26settings%3DeyJkb19ub3Rfc2hvd19hZ2FpbiI6IiJ9>)
## Smart Switch
The utility player that sets your home up for safety and convenience.
  * Works with the free Deako mobile app
  * Integrates with Amazon Alexa & Google Home
  * Connects to the Alarm.com security panel


**Best for:**
  * Outdoor Lights – sunrise/sunset schedule
  * Hallway/Stairs – schedules or timers so you don’t trip in the dark!
  * Kids Rooms – set timers so they don’t get left on.


[ Speak With an Expert ](https://www.deako.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/bvm1/drh-preclose-packages>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20444%20644'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
[ ](https://www.deako.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aclose%26settings%3DeyJkb19ub3Rfc2hvd19hZ2FpbiI6IiJ9>)
## Smart Dimmer
The luxury choice that combines smart lighting automation with remote and tactile dimming for ultimate control.
  * Works with the free Deako mobile app
  * Integrates with Amazon Alexa & Google Home
  * Connects to the Alarm.com security panel


**Best for:**
  * Open concept living/dining/kitchen – you need them everywhere!
  * Bedroom – wind down or wake up gradually with adjustable lighting
  * Master bath – No aggressively bright lights for middle-of-the-night trips


[ Speak With an Expert ](https://www.deako.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/bvm1/drh-preclose-packages>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20444%20644'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
[ ](https://www.deako.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aclose%26settings%3DeyJkb19ub3Rfc2hvd19hZ2FpbiI6IiJ9>)
## Motion Sensor Switch
The simple switch with smart capabilities, this energy-saving and efficient switch detects motion to trigger lights for simple automation.
**Best for:**
  * Laundry room – lights come on automatically when hands are full
  * Garage – no fumbling for lights when taking out the garbage
  * Pantry – never forget to turn out the lights after grabbing a snack


[ Speak With an Expert ](https://www.deako.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/bvm1/drh-preclose-packages>)
Get Updates 
## Sign up below to stay updated 
Product announcements, promotions, and more!

## Simple Timer
Save energy and your peace of mind with a switch that turns off on its own.
**Best for:**
  * Bathroom – Stop babysitting the bathroom fan or lights. Just choose a 10-, 30-, or 60-min timer and they’ll turn off automatically 
  * Hallways – move safely around the house at night or for a late snack without turning on the lights 
  * Attic, Garage, Closets – Install it anywhere you or others in the family tend to forget to turn off the lights

generated_description:
Deako is a Seattle-based innovative company that's transforming how we think about lighting in our homes. Their mission is straightforward: create beautiful, connected light switches that allow anyone to enjoy the wonders of smart lighting, no matter their budget. This isn't just about aesthetics; it's about making smart lighting accessible to all.

Founded during the Y Combinator Batch W16, Deako introduced the modular light switch—a game changer that allows homeowners to customize and upgrade their systems in seconds, without needing to shut off the power. This approach has garnered significant recognition, including being named the #1 Smart Lighting Control System by TecHome Builder and a spot in the Top 25 Innovative IoT Companies by Entrepreneur.

Their product lineup includes smart switches, dimmers, and motion sensors, all designed with the user in mind. Each switch is easy to install, effectively turning anyone into their own electrician. This practicality is crucial; it empowers homeowners to control the ambiance of their space without complicated setups or the extra cost of professional installation.

With a team of 11 employees and notable backing from investor Michael Seibel, Deako is well-positioned in a rapidly growing market. They've shipped over 30 million products, installed in 300,000 homes and counting. Each month sees approximately 10,000 new homes equipped with Deako's smart lighting solutions, reflecting a growing consumer base enamored with their user-friendly designs.

Deako has not only made waves in terms of functionality; they bring style to the table, too. Their designer switches inject a touch of elegance into any home—a stark contrast to traditional options that often lack visual appeal. Plus, Deako's products can be managed via popular platforms like Google Home and Amazon Alexa, making it easy to integrate smart technology into daily routines.

Being a standout in the industry, Deako is tagged with the key themes of IoT and home automation, signaling their commitment to future-proofing homes. The company invites inquiries through their website, where prospective customers and builders can learn more about their offerings and get assistance with installations.

To summarize, Deako isn't just selling light switches—they're simplifying the way we interact with our environments, injecting a bit of beauty and a ton of user-friendliness into our homes. If you're looking to upgrade your lighting, Deako seems to be the smart choice to consider. Check them out at [Deako.com](https://www.deako.com).
